ygData.subject: Re: dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about the exp loss. A long time ago (couple months) I lost a duel and lost exp, but people have said that you don t know, so that might have been
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about the exp loss. A long time ago (couple months) I lost a
duel and lost exp, but people have said that you don't know, so that might
have been a bug. You can not loot, however, as I killed a pesky wood elf
yesterday but I couldn't loot him. I don't know about pvp arenas, but I
doubt you can loot there. You don't get exp for the kill, either. You do,
however, get the satisfaction of destroying pesky rangers and paladins.
that's quite fun. :)
